txt.en: Talk to Klúso near Stazg Vozag

'I'm afraid you're going to have to get your hands dirty, [placeholder]. To disrupt this camp, you're going to have to fight the hobgoblins and the one in charge here, a wholly unpleasant fellow by the name of Captain Zúrthrug. He's a real bad sort, if half of the things I've heard whispered about him are true.

'But you need not fear any of that. You're a hero, aren't you? This out-camp will be just a footnote in your legend, when all is said and done, and no one will remember Captain Zúrthrug at all!

'Good luck!'
The out-camp of Stazg Vozag is slightly north-east of the centre of the Pit of Stonejaws.

'See? I knew you could handle it. Didn't doubt you for a moment! The hobgoblins will soon notice that their out-camp has been, well... cleared out... and if we play our runes right, they will blame it on the Orcs!\n\n'They did not know they were dealing with a master of Hammers and Bones, but so they are! And my skill at the runic dice translates onto the battlefield, see if it does not!'
Klúso is scouting near Stazg Vozag.
Hobgoblins working from the out-camp of Stazg Vozag pose a grave danger to the dwarves in the Pit of Stonejaws.
Defeated Captain Zúrthrug, who did not live up to his whispered legend
Defeat the fearsome Captain Zúrthrug, about whom the whispers gather
